title: Happy Birthday, Umi-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Umi-chaaaaaaaaaaan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Is that.... Honoka?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Happyyyyyyyyy!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Honoka! It’s dangerous to run like th-<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Birthdaaaaaaaaay!!! Baaam!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Kyaah!? Owowow.... Ah! Honoka, are you hurt!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ahahaha, I couldn’t brake fast enough! How about you, Umi-chan, are you okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Yes, I’m fine. But I’ve always told you that it’s dangerous to leap while going that fast, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Hmm, you aren’t scolding me that hard today, Umi-chan~. It must be because it’s your birthday, huh!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Geez.... I’ll say it as many times as you want until you understand, okay! ....Or so I would like to say, but I’ll overlook it because it’s special today. Thank you for celebrating my birthday, Honoka!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
